Text:
The story of Billy Graham's extraordinary life and ministry..

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5450920/Billy_Graham_-_God_s_ambassador

Is that including a "look behind the scenes" when it comes to his association with "members of secret societies", to put it.. ..let's say.. vague?

I think I'll wait for the story of Nicky Cruz; "Run Baby, Run", or the story of "David Wilkerson's Extraordinary Relationship with God and What Happens Around Him - Still."

"Run Baby, Run!", is the cross and the switchblade like it really happened, or more based on Nicky Cruz' own story.

The Wilkerson movie.. ..Well, somehow I doubt that one will ever be made.. Wonder why..

Could be because he doesn't preach pre-tribulation rapture/left behind bullshit..

Could be because he actually preaches stuff the presidents of USA never really favored for their Sunday morning breakfast..

Hmmmm..
V.
